MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH39 postcode area of North Berwick  affecting properties in Dirleton and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs on grounded overhead lines, we needed to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7.15pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:24pm on Wednesday, 10 March 2021
